name: Lymph Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have absorb 1. (If a source would deal damage to a Sliver, prevent 1 of that damage.)
flavor_text: Its skin remains in a flowing, liquid state that keeps its body coated with potent restorative lymph.

name: Poultice Sliver
oracle_text: All Slivers have "{2}, {T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
flavor_text:
"Its broad claw suggests a chitinous shield, but in fact it conceals glands that secrete a remarkably swift healing agent."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Pulmonic Sliver
oracle_text:
All Sliver creatures have flying.
All Slivers have "If this permanent would be put into a graveyard, you may put it on top of its owner's library instead."
flavor_text: Like a great bellows it hisses, and its kin, both living and dead, are lifted to safety.

name: Restore Balance
oracle_text:
Suspend 6—{W} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {W} and exile it with six time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players sacrifice creatures and discard cards the same way.

name: Sinew Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: As the muscle cords of the creature twitched, Hanna saw an unsettling unanimity in the others' rippling flesh. She didn't know what it meant, but she urged Sisay to keep the ship at a safe distance.

name: Crovax, Ascendant Hero
oracle_text:
Other white creatures get +1/+1.
Nonwhite creatures get -1/-1.
Pay 2 life: Return Crovax, Ascendant Hero to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Crovax was destined for an angel's curse, but one warped timeline saw the noble redeemed.

name: Tolarian Sentinel
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "It is not just our people I try to rescue. It is our culture, and our hope that we can return to greatness."

name: Coral Trickster
oracle_text:
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Coral Trickster is turned face up, you may tap or untap target permanent.
flavor_text: They wait in darkened depths, laughing eagerly.

name: Fathom Seer
oracle_text:
Morph—Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand. (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Fathom Seer is turned face up, draw two cards.

name: Riptide Pilferer
oracle_text:
Whenever Riptide Pilferer deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Vesuvan Shapeshifter
oracle_text:
As Vesuvan Shapeshifter enters the battlefield or is turned face up, you may choose another creature on the battlefield. If you do, until Vesuvan Shapeshifter is turned face down, it becomes a copy of that creature, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may turn this creature face down."
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

name: Brine Elemental
oracle_text:
Morph {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Brine Elemental is turned face up, each opponent skips their next untap step.
flavor_text: Water calls to water, and the world is left exhausted and withered in its wake.

name: Master of the Pearl Trident
oracle_text: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1 and have islandwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: "Let the land dwellers know the coast is no longer the border between our realms. A new age of empire has begun."

name: Dralnu, Lich Lord
oracle_text:
If damage would be dealt to Dralnu, Lich Lord, sacrifice that many permanents instead.
{T}: Target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Gossamer Phantasm
oracle_text:
Flying
When Gossamer Phantasm becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
flavor_text:
"Belief matters more than truth. Every moment, belief in imaginary things alters lives while truth sits unnoticed and waits."
—Hakim, Loreweaver

name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Cloudseeder
oracle_text:
Flying
{U}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 blue Faerie creature token named Cloud Sprite. It has flying and "Cloud Sprite can block only creatures with flying."

name: Pact of Negation
oracle_text:
Counter target spell.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {3}{U}{U}. If you don't, you lose the game.
flavor_text: Those who expect betrayal at every turn are seldom disappointed.

name: Sarcomite Myr
oracle_text:
{2}: Sarcomite Myr gains flying until end of turn.
{2}, Sacrifice Sarcomite Myr: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A horrible sight, yes, but the sounds . . . Its twanging tendons and grinding gears are almost musical."
—Brudiclad, Telchor engineer

name: Teferi, Mage of Zhalfir
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield have flash.
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
flavor_text: To save this plane, he must forsake all others.

name: Think Twice
oracle_text:
Draw a card.
Flashback {2}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text:
"Great books are meant to be read, then read again backwards or upside down!"
—Ettovard, Tolarian archivist

name: Treasure Cruise
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Draw three cards.
flavor_text: Countless delights drift on the surface while dark schemes run below.

name: Bonded Fetch
oracle_text:
Defender, haste
{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: A well-made homunculus grooms the mind of its master, pruning the thoughts that lead to madness. Few loredelvers survive the study of the infinite without one.

name: Foresee
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards. (To scry 4, look at the top four cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
flavor_text: Wind time's watch, and watch time unwind.

name: Pongify
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
flavor_text: Some spellcrafting mistakes go on to become spells of their own.

name: Snapback
oracle_text:
You may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"If it returns years hence, our knowledge of how to combat it will be that much greater."
—Andorel, Tolarian sentinel

name: Aeon Chronicler
oracle_text:
Aeon Chronicler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.
Suspend X—{X}{3}{U}. X can't be 0. (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {X}{3}{U} and exile it with X time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)
Whenever a time counter is removed from Aeon Chronicler while it's exiled, draw a card.

name: Draining Whelk
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
When Draining Whelk enters the battlefield, counter target spell. Put X +1/+1 counters on Draining Whelk, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

name: Spell Burst
oracle_text:
Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Counter target spell with converted mana cost X.

name: Disdainful Stroke
oracle_text: Counter target spell with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor_text: "You are beneath contempt. Your lineage will be forgotten."

name: Trinket Mage
oracle_text: When Trinket Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Logic Knot
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}.
flavor_text: "Such sloppy work. Let's unravel it and try again!"

name: Delay
oracle_text: Counter target spell. If the spell is countered this way, exile it with three time counters on it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, the player plays it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

name: Temporal Isolation
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has shadow. (It can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Saltblast
oracle_text: Destroy target nonwhite permanent.
flavor_text: Dominaria erodes with each passing gust.

name: Baral, Chief of Compliance
oracle_text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Whenever a spell or ability you control counters a spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: "The echo of silence is music to my ears."

name: Stonehorn Dignitary
oracle_text: When Stonehorn Dignitary enters the battlefield, target opponent skips their next combat phase.
flavor_text: It did not escape the ambassador's notice that the sound of war drums could also marshal the city to attention.

name: Careful Consideration
oracle_text: Target player draws four cards, then discards three cards. If you cast this spell during your main phase, instead that player draws four cards, then discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"Sages who take the time to verify their sources are rewarded for their diligence."
—Jhoira, to Teferi

name: Mystical Teachings
oracle_text:
Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Repeal
oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with converted mana cost X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Your deed cannot be undone. You, however, can be."
—Agosto, Azorius imperator
